title: SquadBlast
description: SquadBlast is an action multiplayer game, a run-and-gun shooter set in the dystopian world set in 2042. With deep class-based combat, each hero brings unique abilities to the battlefield, requiring strategic mastery for victory. The game seamlessly blends the intensity of FPS gameplay with dynamic movement options, offering a refreshing take on the genre. Engage in meaty multiplayer modes, explore diverse maps, and wield various weapons, from assault rifles to experimental supa weapons. Join the fight against oppressive forces, where every bullet matters, and skill reigns supreme.
